headline: AI Demand Generates Rise in Caterpillar Shares
summary: Caterpillar and other generator manufacturers are benefiting from the investor optimism lifting artificial-intelligence stocks. Power-hungry AI projects have become a boon to Caterpillar, which sells engines and generators to a range of customers.

raw.headline: AI Demand Generates Rise in Caterpillar Shares
raw.summary: Caterpillar and other generator manufacturers are benefiting from the investor optimism lifting artificial-intelligence stocks. Power-hungry AI projects have become a boon to Caterpillar, which sells engines and generators to a range of customers.

headline: GE Vernova (NYSE:GEV) Beats Q3 CY2025 Sales Expectations
summary: Energy transition company GE Vernova (NYSE:GEV) reported Q3 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 11.8% year on year to $9.97 billion. On the other hand, the company’s full-year revenue guidance of $36.5 billion at the midpoint came in 1.8% below analysts’ estimates. Its GAAP profit of $1.64 per share was 11.5% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Can GE Vernova's Strategic Acquisitions Boost Its Energy Transition?
summary: GEV is boosting electrification and grid strength through targeted acquisitions, expanding reach, and supply chains to meet rising power demand.

headline: AI Trade’s Next Leg Is All About Tech’s ‘Pick-and-Shovel’ Stocks
summary: Data storage companies dominated the S&P 500 Index in 2025, with Sandisk Corp. shares soaring almost 580% to make them the benchmark’s best performer, with Western Digital Corp. in second and Seagate Technology Holdings Plc in fourth.  Meanwhile, AI-linked power providers and cable and fiber producers such as Amphenol Corp., Corning Inc., NRG Energy Inc. and GE Vernova Inc. were among the Top 25.
